text: Drummond was an electoral district in the Centre-du-Québec region of Quebec, Canada, which elected members to the National Assembly of Quebec. Its last election had most of the city of Drummondville and all of Saint-Edmond-de- Grantham, Saint-Eugène, Saint-Germain-de-Grantham and Saint-Majorique-de- Grantham. Category:Geography of Quebec Category:Elections in Canada
title: Drummond (provincial electoral district)
